tag: {display:{Name:'{"text":"凋亡箭","italic": false}',Lore:['[{"text":"为命中的目标附加 20 秒","color":"gray","italic": false},{"text":"凋零","underlined":true},"效果。",{"text":"（每 1 秒","color":"dark_gray"}]','[{"text":"受到 1 点伤害，持续伤害类效果均不叠加）","color":"dark_gray","italic": false}]','{"text":"因此，若被满弦命中且未能及时开始静息治疗，","color":"gray","italic": false}','{"text":"就一定会缓慢凋亡。","color":"gray","italic": false}','""','[{"text":"✳ 冷却  ","italic": false,"color":"aqua"},{"text":"20 秒","italic": false,"color":"white"},{"text":"      ⚜ 储存  ","italic": false,"color":"gold"},{"text":"2 支","italic": false,"color":"white"}]','[{"text":"❤ 伤害  ","italic": false,"color":"red"},{"text":"9 - 16.5（满弦）+ 20（凋零）","italic": false,"color":"white"}]','[{"text":"✏ 细节  按 [","color":"dark_gray","italic": false},{"keybind":"key.drop"}, "] 收起详情"]']},HideFlags:63}
